Smart Power Strip: Create a power strip with built-in Wi-Fi capabilities, allowing users to control their devices remotely using an app. This smart power strip can also detect when devices are not in use and automatically turn them off to save energy.

Multi-Outlet Power Strip: Design a power strip with multiple outlets that can be adjusted to fit different device sizes. This will ensure that all devices are properly charged and prevent overcrowding.

Portable Power Strip: Create a compact and lightweight power strip that can be easily carried in a backpack or bag. This will be ideal for travelers or individuals who need to charge their devices on the go.

Power Strip with USB-C Charging: Develop a power strip with USB-C charging ports, allowing users to charge their devices quickly and efficiently. This will be especially useful for individuals who use multiple USB-C devices at once.

Customizable Power Strip: Design a power strip with interchangeable outlets and adapters, allowing users to customize their power strip to fit their specific needs. This will ensure that the power strip is versatile and can accommodate different devices and charging requirements.
